titles.title: Our Father (As It Is In Heaven)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Our Father, who art in Heaven
Hallowed be thy name
Come and let Your glory come
And let Your glory fall.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Our Father, who art in Heaven
The rocks cry out Your fame
Come and let Your glory, come
And let Your glory fall.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I will sing, sing a new song
I will sing, sing a new song
I will sing, sing a new song to the Lord

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Let your kingdom come
Let your will be done
On earth as it is in heaven
Every heart proclaim
The mercy of Your name
On earth as it is in heaven.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
God give us new every morning
Mercy as daily bread
In the name of Jesus
In the name of Jesus we pray

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
And lead us, not to temptation
But deliver us with Your hand
In the name of Jesus
In the name of Jesus we pray, Father we pray!

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
For the Kingdom is Yours
And the power is Yours
And the glory forever Amen
